title: Can I score 90+ in the 12th board in 4 months? I am a PCM student. - Quora

response.answer_text: Please do not get fixated on what marks you want to achieve. Else you will be just dreaming of 90–95 percentage marks. I would suggest you to create a study plan. Make sure you plan for a minimum of 2–3 rounds of revision of each topic. The more you practice, the better for you. Important: Stick to the study plan. In the end, whatever marks you get, be happy. You did your best in the 4 months available to you.
